DOC.brief_summary: This protocol compare immune response different influenza vaccine give two different route administration healthy adult age 18 64 year .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Delivery Routes Flu Vaccine Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , randomize , partially blind trial compare safety immunogenicity intramuscularly versus intradermally administer influenza vaccine healthy 18-64 year old adult . Subjects blood drawn immediately prior approximately three four week vaccination . After completion trial , subject offer influenza vaccine 2005-2006 formulation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject healthy , determined medical history 2 . Over 18 year age yet 65 year old 3 . Provides write informed consent 4 . Able attend schedule visit comply trial procedure 5 . Women may menopausal 1 year sugically sterile . Women childbearing potential must agree abstinent use license form barrier hormonal contraception entire study period , negative pregnancy test within 24 hour prior vaccination . 1 . Breastfeeding 2 . Receipt investigational drug , biologic device 4 week precede trial vaccination 3 . Planned participation another clinical trial present trial period 4 . History GuillainBarré Syndrome 5 . Congenital acquire immunodeficiency , immunosuppressive therapy anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy within precede 6 month , longterm systemic corticosteroid therapy 6 . Hypersensitivity vaccine component ( include egg egg product thimerosol gelatin ) history lifethreatening reaction trial vaccine vaccine contain substance 7 . Chronic illness could interfere trial conduct completion 8 . Blood bloodderived product receive past 3 month 9 . Has receive inactivate vaccine within 2 week live vaccine within 4 week prior enrollment study 10 . Vaccination plan within 4 week follow trial vaccination 11 . Known current HIV , hepatitis B ( HBsAg ) hepatitis C infection seropositivity 12 . Prior vaccination influenza within past 6 month 13 . Allergy shoot 7day period prior enrollment must schedule receive allergy shot 7day period enrollment 14 . On coumadin heparin therapy know thrombocytopenia bleed disorder contraindicate vaccination 15 . Subject deprive freedom administrative court order , emergency setting , hospitalize without his/her consent 16 . Febrile illness temperature > = 37.5°C Day 0 , prior enrollment vaccination 17 . Any condition , , opinion investigator , would pose health risk participant 18 . History alcohol drug abuse last 5 year 19 . Planned travel outside US vaccination second study visit 20 . Presence active skin disease injection site , opinion Investigator , would impact vaccine delivery assessment vaccination site
